objectives_summary: Identify a typology that explains how commercialization risk affects new ventures/new products.
Recognize when a new venture/new product’s commercialization risk has been minimized and when “normal business risk” has been achieved.

items.title: Financial Management Made Easy for All

visible_instructors.name: Dr. Ma'en
visible_instructors.job_title: Founder of Knowledge Horizon & Ph.D. in Finance & Investment
visible_instructors.title: Dr. Ma'en Al Qatamin

items.headline: A simple, innovative, and  engaging approach to demystify the concepts of finance
objectives_summary: Time Value of Money:  •Recognise the meaning and importance of compounding and discounting;  •Calculate and analyse the future value and present value of a lump sum amount;  •Compare the present value of an annuity with the present value of an annuity due
Liquidity Ratios: •Identify the importance of liquidity ratios; •Calculate different liquidity ratios; •Interpret the calculated ratios; •Identify measures to improve the ratios

Efficiency Ratios: •Identify the importance of the efficiency ratios;  •Calculate the different efficiency ratios; •Analyse the efficiency ratios of the company with respect to industry standards; •Identify measures to improve the efficiency ratios
